## CredentialStatusResolver interface

CredentialStatusResolver is an interface that allows to interact with deifferent types of credential status to resolve revocation status

 CredentialStatusResolver

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface CredentialStatusResolver 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [resolve(credentialStatus, opts)](./js-sdk.credentialstatusresolver.resolve.md) | resolve is a method to resolve a credential status from the the spefic source. |
